name: MTLRasterizationRateLayerArray
desc: Descriptions for the rasterization rates to apply to the set of layers in a rate map.

items.name: subscript(Int) -> MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor?
items.desc: Retrieves the sample value at the specified index.

items.name: class MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor
items.desc: The minimum rasterization rates to apply to sections of a layer in the render target.
